info.title: Intellector WebSocket API

server_shutdown.name: server_shutdown
server_shutdown.title: Server Shutdown
server_shutdown.summary: Broadcasted to `everyone` channel group whenever the server starts preparing for the shutdown

game_started.name: game_started
game_started.title: Game Started (for player's followers)
game_started.summary: Broadcasted to `player.started_games` channel group whenever a new game involving a respective player starts

new_public_challenge.name: new_public_challenge
new_public_challenge.title: New Public Challenge
new_public_challenge.summary: Broadcasted to `public_challenge_list` channel group whenever a new public challenge is created

public_challenge_cancelled.name: public_challenge_cancelled
public_challenge_cancelled.title: Public Challenge Cancelled
public_challenge_cancelled.summary: Broadcasted to `public_challenge_list` channel group whenever a public challenge is cancelled

public_challenge_fulfilled.name: public_challenge_fulfilled
public_challenge_fulfilled.title: Public Challenge Fulfilled
public_challenge_fulfilled.summary: Broadcasted to `public_challenge_list` channel group whenever a public challenge is fulfilled (i.e. accepted by someone)

new_active_game.name: new_active_game
new_active_game.title: Game Started (for game lists watchers)
new_active_game.summary: Broadcasted to `game_list` channel group whenever a new game starts

new_recent_game.name: new_recent_game
new_recent_game.title: Game Ended (for game lists watchers)
new_recent_game.summary: Broadcasted to `game_list` channel group whenever a game ends

incoming_challenge_received.name: incoming_challenge_received
incoming_challenge_received.title: Incoming Challenge Received
incoming_challenge_received.summary: Broadcasted to `incoming_challenges` channel group whenever a direct challenge arrives

incoming_challenge_cancelled.name: incoming_challenge_cancelled
incoming_challenge_cancelled.title: Incoming Challenge Cancelled
incoming_challenge_cancelled.summary: Broadcasted to `incoming_challenges` channel group whenever an incoming direct challenge is cancelled

outgoing_challenge_accepted.name: outgoing_challenge_accepted
outgoing_challenge_accepted.title: Outgoing Challenge Accepted
outgoing_challenge_accepted.summary: Broadcasted to `outgoing_challenges` channel group whenever an outgoing (direct or open) challenge is accepted

outgoing_challenge_rejected.name: outgoing_challenge_rejected
outgoing_challenge_rejected.title: Outgoing Challenge Rejected
outgoing_challenge_rejected.summary: Broadcasted to `outgoing_challenges` channel group whenever an outgoing direct challenge is rejected

outgoing_challenge_cancelled_by_server.name: outgoing_challenge_cancelled_by_server
outgoing_challenge_cancelled_by_server.title: Outgoing Challenge Cancelled by Server
outgoing_challenge_cancelled_by_server.summary: Broadcasted to `outgoing_challenges` channel group whenever the server cancels an outgoing challenge due to shutdown

new_ply.name: new_ply
new_ply.title: New Ply
new_ply.summary: Broadcasted to `game` channel group whenever a new move happens on the board

new_chat_message.name: new_chat_message
new_chat_message.title: New Chat Message
new_chat_message.summary: Broadcasted to `game` channel group whenever a new chat message arrives

offer_action_performed.name: offer_action_performed
offer_action_performed.title: Offer Action Performed
offer_action_performed.summary: Broadcasted to `game` channel group whenever a draw or takeback offer is created, cancelled, accepted or rejected

time_added.name: time_added
time_added.title: Time Added
time_added.summary: Broadcasted to `game` channel group whenever a player decides to add time to the opponent's reserves

rollback.name: rollback
rollback.title: Rollback
rollback.summary: Broadcasted to `game` channel group whenever some of the last moves get cancelled

game_ended.name: game_ended
game_ended.title: Game Ended (for specific game watchers)
game_ended.summary: Broadcasted to `game` channel group when the game ends
